document.discussion_title: Income from operations boosts IRB net
document.topic_text: Home News Markets Companies Money & Banking Economy Info-tech Opinion Specials Luxe Portfolio Catalyst BLink Find Company: Income from operations boosts IRB net Our Bureau Tweet Mumbai, August 11: Road construction company IRB Infrastructure Developers, riding on higher income from operations, has posted a 10 per cent increase in net profit for the quarter ended June 30. The company has reported net profit of ₹181 crore for Q1 FY17, against ₹164 crore in the year ago quarter. Income from operations increased 36 per cent to ₹1,517 crore (₹1,108 crore).
